titleStmt.title: A poem on the coronation of James II of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, King, defender of the faith
titleStmt.author: Willoughby, Stephen, b. 1657 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D. Mallet for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Stephen Willoughby. cf. NUC pre-1956.
